name: Salted Grapefruit Fizz
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'ruby grapefruit, zested and juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sugar'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'kosher salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grapefruit juice'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'club soda'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'citrus ice ring (optional)'}
steps: To make the salted grapefruit cordial: Remove strips of zest from 1 ruby grapefruit with a vegetable peeler, avoiding any white pith. Stir grapefruit zest and sugar together in a jar. Chill, covered, for 24 hours.. Squeeze juice from the grapefruit and measure out 1/2 cup juice. Pour 1/2 cup grapefruit juice, fresh lime juice, and water over the sugar mixture in the jar. Stir in kosher salt. Stir or shake mixture to dissolve sugar. Strain out zest; chill for 1 hour or cover and keep chilled for up to 3 days.. To make the punch: Combine salted grapefruit cordial, grapefruit juice, and lime juice in a punch bowl. Chill until ready to serve; pour in club soda before serving with citrus ice ring, if using.. To make a citrus ice ring: Fill an ice ring mold with very thin half slices of grapefruit and very thin slices of lime. Fill ring halfway with water; freeze until firm, about 30 minutes. Add more water to fill mold, freeze until firm, about 2 hours.

name: Mezcal Hot Toddy
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1 1/2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'maple syrup'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': None, 'name': 'hibiscus tea bags (or 3 tablespoons dried hibiscus flowers'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'mezcal'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chile liqueur'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'orange slices'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'whole cloves'}
steps: Heat  water, orange juice, and pure maple syrup just to a boil in a Dutch oven. Remove from heat. Add 8 tea bags (or dried flowers). Cover and steep for 5 to 7 minutes.. Remove tea bags (or strain). Add mezcal and chile liqueur. Keep warm over very low heat or transfer to a slow cooker set to Keep Warm. Serve in mugs; garnish with orange slices studded with cloves.

name: Apple Cider Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bag', 'name': 'cinnamon tea'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'cinnamon stick, plus more for serving'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'apple cider'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '1/3', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'maple syrup, plus more for garnish'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'turbinado sugar, for garnish'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'lemon wedges, for serving'}
steps: Steep tea bag and cinnamon stick in the boiling water 5 minutes or according to package directions. Discard tea bag and cinnamon stick. Let cool.. Combine tea, apple cider, lemon juice, and maple syrup in a pitcher. Serve immediately (or chill up to 2 days).. To serve, spread additional maple syrup on a small plate and Demerara sugar (or turbinado sugar) on another small plate. Dip rim of glass into maple syrup to coat and then into Demerara to coat. Fill glass with ice (see “Everything’s Rosy,” below) and add punch. Serve with lemon wedges and additional cinnamon sticks.

name: Hard Cranberry Limeade
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'cranberry vodka (such as Deep Eddy)'}, {'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'lime vodka'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'ice, as needed'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'Sprite'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'lime slice, for garnish'}
steps: Combine cranberry vodka and lime vodka in a tall glass. Add ice, top off with Sprite, and stir. Garnish with lime slice.

name: Mulled Cranberry Juice
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cranberry juice cocktail'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': None, 'name': 'whole cloves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'cinnamon stick, plus more for serving'}, {'quantity': '1 or 2', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'oranges, thinly sliced, plus more for serving'}
steps: Combine cranberry juice cocktail, granulated sugar, whole cloves, cinnamon stick, and orange slices in a 4-quart saucepan over medium heat.. Bring to a boil; stir until sugar dissolves. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 to 20 minutes.. Allow to cool slightly, and ladle into punch cups. Float one orange slice in each cup and garnish with a cinnamon stick. Serve warm.

name: Grinch Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'quarts', 'name': 'lime sherbet, sitting at room temperature for a few minutes to soften'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'liter', 'name': 'lemon-lime soda'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'Hawaiian Punch'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'pineapple juice, plus more for coating glass rims'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'glass', 'name': 'sugar, for coating glass rims'}
steps: Scoop softened lime sherbet into the bottom of a large punch bowl.. Pour the lemon-lime soda, Hawaiian Punch, and 2 cups pineapple juice over the sherbet and stir.. Place red sanding sugar in a shallow dish, and some additional pineapple juice in a separate shallow dish. Dip the rims of your serving glasses in the pineapple juice, then in the sanding sugar to coat the rims generously.. Ladle the punch into the prepared glasses.

name: Oolong, Orange, and Whiskey Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(2 inch)', 'name': 'cinnamon stick'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whole star anise'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'oolong tea bags'}, {'quantity': '2 ⅔', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh orange juice'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'whiskey'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice (from 1 lemon)'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'large ice cubes'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'tangerine, sectioned and seeded'}
steps: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan over high heat. Stir in sugar, cinnamon stick, and star anise. Remove from heat and add tea bags. Let steep for 3 minutes (or according to package directions for strongest tea). Remove tea bags. Let cool to room temperature, about 1 hour. Remove and discard cinnamon stick and star anise.. Stir together tea mixture, orange juice, whiskey, and lemon juice in a punch bowl or pitcher. Chill until cold, about 2 hours or up to overnight.. Garnish with tangerine slices and additional star anise. Ladle into ice-filled glasses. Top each with a tangerine slice.

name: Brandy Slush
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '(2g) bags', 'name': 'green tea'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'boiling water, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'brandy'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen lemonade concentrate'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen orange juice concentrate'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(2 liter) bottle', 'name': 'lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage'}

Stir in brandy, lemonade concentrate, and orange juice concentrate until combined.. Remove tea bags and stir tea into brandy mixture. Freeze 8 hours to overnight.. To serve, scoop desired amount into a glass. Fill the glass with lemon-lime soda; stir.

name: Luscious Slush Punch

steps: Bring water, sugar, and strawberry-flavored gelatin to a boil in a large saucepan; boil for 3 minutes. Stir in pineapple juice, lemon juice, and orange juice.. Divide mixture into two separate containers and freeze.. Combine contents of 1 container frozen juice mixture with 1 bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage in a punch bowl; stir until slushy. Repeat with remaining portions as needed.

Let the punch start to thaw 2 to 3 hours before serving. Serve slushy.

Add 1 cinnamon stick to each mug.

name: Easy Christmas Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(46 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'pineapple juice'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 ounce) can', 'name': 'lemonade'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'liter', 'name': 'ginger ale'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'liter', 'name': 'lemon-lime soda (such as Sprite®)'}
steps: Mix pineapple juice, orange juice, lemonade, and water in a large punch bowl. Stir in ginger ale and lemon-lime soda.

name: Wassail Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'quarts', 'name': 'apple cider'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whole cloves'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cinnamon sticks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground ginger'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}
steps: In a slow-cooker or a large pot over low heat, combine apple cider, orange juice and lemon juice. Season with cloves, ginger and nutmeg. Bring to a simmer. If using a slow cooker, allow to simmer all day. Serve hot.

name: Berrylicious Frozen Sangria Slushie
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'red wine'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'ice cubes, crushed'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'frozen blueberries'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh raspberries'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'frozen strawberries'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'orange-flavored liqueur'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'orange, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white sugar, or more to taste'}
steps: Combine red wine, ice cubes, blueberries, raspberries, strawberries, orange-flavored liqueur, orange juice, and sugar in a blender; process until smooth. Serve immediately or freeze.

name: Caribbean Rum Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'simple syrup'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'amber rum'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'bitters'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'freshly grated nutmeg'}
steps: In a pitcher, combine lime juice, simple syrup, rum and orange juice. Add a few dashes of bitters and some grated nutmeg to taste. Serve chilled over ice.

name: Rhubarb Slush
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh rhubarb, chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6 ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6 ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'gin (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(2 liter) bottle', 'name': 'lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage, chilled'}
steps: Place rhubarb in a large saucepan with water to cover. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat and cook until tender. Drain; mash or purée in a blender.. Stir together rhubarb purée, sugar, orange juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate, gin, and water. Freeze for 1 to 3 hours, depending on the consistency you like.. Place scoops of the frozen mixture into serving glasses and fill the rest of the glass with lemon-lime soda.

name: Apple Orchard Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(32 fluid ounce) bottle', 'name': 'apple juice, chilled'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen cranberry juice concentrate'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'liters', 'name': 'ginger ale'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'apple'}
steps: In a large punch bowl, combine apple juice, cranberry juice concentrate and orange juice. Stir until dissolved, then slowly pour in the ginger ale.. Thinly slice the apple vertically, forming whole apple slices. Float apple slices on top of punch.

name: Polynesian Watermelon Drink ('Otai)
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'seedless watermelon, halved and sliced'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(15.25 ounce) can', 'name': 'crushed pineapple'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'evaporated milk'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded coconut'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white sugar, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}
steps: Grate watermelon with a fork from the rind into a large bowl, leaving no large chunks. Stir water, pineapple, evaporated milk, and coconut into the grated watermelon. Add sugar; stir until dissolved. Squeeze lime juice into the watermelon mixture.

name: Honey Limeade
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '⅔', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'honey'}
steps: In a pitcher, combine lime juice, water, sugar and honey. Stir until sugar is dissolved. Chill in refrigerator.

name: Banana Slush Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe bananas'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(46 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'pineapple juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) cans', 'name': 'frozen orange juice concentrate'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen lemonade concentrate'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'liters', 'name': 'ginger ale'}
steps: In a blender, combine bananas, sugar, and 3 cups water. Blend until smooth. Pour into a large bowl and stir in pineapple juice. Blend in orange juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate, and 3 cups water. Divide into 3 plastic containers and freeze until solid, 4 hours to overnight.. Remove from freezer 3 to 4 hours before serving. Using one portion at a time, place slush in a punch bowl and pour in 1 liter of ginger ale for each.

name: Blackberry Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'Spanish red wine'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'blackberry brandy'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'triple sec'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'blackberries, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'hulled strawberries, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh pineapple'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'apple, chopped'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice cubes'}
steps: Combine wine, brandy, triple sec, orange juice, and sugar together in a pitcher or bowl; add blackberries, strawberries, pineapple, apple, and ice and mix well. Refrigerate for 8 hours to overnight.

name: Pineapple Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottles', 'name': 'Sauvignon Blanc'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'pineapple juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'triple sec'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'brandy'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, seeded and chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh pineapple'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped orange'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped lime'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage (such as 7-Up®)'}
steps: Combine Sauvignon Blanc, pineapple juice, triple sec, and brandy in a large pitcher. Add lemon, pineapple, orange, and lime. Cover and refrigerate, 8 hours to overnight.. Stir in lemon-lime soda before serving.

name: Sunset Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'rose wine'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pineapple juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vodka'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'triple sec'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'simple syrup'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'orange, sliced into rounds'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, sliced into rounds'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, sliced into rounds'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6 ounce) container', 'name': 'fresh raspberries'}
steps: Combine wine, pineapple juice, vodka, triple sec, and simple syrup in a large bowl or pitcher. Refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour.. Stir the oranges, lemons, limes, and raspberries into the chilled sangria at least 30 minutes before serving. The longer the fruit marinates the better. Serve over ice.

name: Easy Raspberry Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen raspberry lemonade concentrate'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can or bottle', 'name': 'lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'crushed ice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh raspberries, garnish'}, {'quantity': '18', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Mint leaves, for garnish'}
steps: In a large punch bowl, combine raspberry lemonade concentrate, water and lime juice. Stir in lemon-lime soda and crushed ice. Garnish each glass with a fresh raspberry and a mint leaf.

name: Warm and Spicy Autumn Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'oranges'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whole cloves'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'apple juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cinnamon stick'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'honey'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '2 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'pineapple juice'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Stud whole oranges with cloves, and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.. In a large saucepan, combine apple juice and cinnamon stick. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium, and simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in nutmeg, honey, lemon juice, and pineapple juice.. Serve hot in a punch bowl with clove-studded baked oranges floating on top.

name: Cranberry Rum Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(32 fluid ounce) bottle', 'name': 'cranberry juice'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ginger ale'}, {'quantity': '2 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'lemon'}
steps: In a medium-size punchbowl, stir cranberry juice and sugar together until the sugar dissolves. Mix in ginger ale, rum, and lemon and lime slices. Serve over ice.

name: Hippie Juice
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1.75 liter) bottle', 'name': 'raspberry lemonade (such as Simply Lemonade®)'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'watermelon vodka'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'coconut-flavored rum (such as Malibu®)'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'triple sec'}
steps: Pour 2 1/2 cups raspberry lemonade out of the bottle into a glass measuring cup.. Pour watermelon vodka, coconut-flavored rum, and triple sec into the bottle; stir to combine. Fill bottle back to the top with raspberry lemonade from the measuring cup. Refrigerate until serving.

name: Swedish Glogg
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cardamom seeds'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cinnamon sticks'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whole cloves'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'orange, zested'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'raisins'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'blanched almonds'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'Muscatel wine, or orange Muscat'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'port wine (or Burgundy)'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'brandy'}
steps: Bring water to a boil in a pot with cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, and orange zest; stir in sugar until dissolved. Remove from heat and allow to steep 8 hours to overnight.. Place raisins and almonds into a large saucepan. Strain sugar water into raisins, then pour in Muscatel, port, and brandy. Place over medium-high heat and cook until hot but not simmering.. Serve warm in a mug with some fruit and almonds in each cup.

name: Non-Alcoholic New Year's Eve Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '3 ½', 'unit': 'liters', 'name': 'ginger ale'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'quarts', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'oranges, sliced into rounds'}, {'quantity': '20', 'unit': '', 'name': 'maraschino cherries'}
steps: Combine ginger ale and orange juice in a large punch bowl. Place sliced oranges and arrange the cherries on top of the orange slices.

name: Christmas Poinsettia Punch

name: New Year's Champagne Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'orange sherbet'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'quarts', 'name': 'fresh orange juice, chilled'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(2 liter) bottle', 'name': 'ginger ale, chilled'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottles', 'name': 'champagne, chilled'}
steps: Place sherbet block in the center of a large punch bowl. Pour orange juice over top, followed by ginger ale and Champagne. Stir gently to mix liquids until top of punch begins to foam. Serve immediately.

name: Mexico Chiquito Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(46 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'pineapple juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 liter) bottle', 'name': 'grenadine syrup'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 ounce) packet', 'name': 'instant tea powder'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'quarts', 'name': 'water, or as needed'}
steps: Mix pineapple juice, grenadine, sugar, lemon juice, and instant tea powder together in a 2-gallon container; stir to dissolve sugar and tea powder. Add enough water to fill the container; stir to combine.

name: Kentucky Derby Bourbon Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '34', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'bourbon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'maraschino cherry juice'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'liters', 'name': 'club soda'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, sliced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'maraschino cherries, halved'}
steps: Stir bourbon, orange juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemon juice, and maraschino cherry juice together in a pitcher until combined.. Pour bourbon mixture into a punch bowl; stir in club soda, cherry halves, and lemon slices.

name: Classic White Wine Spritzer
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'club soda'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white wine'}
steps: Pour wine into glasses, and top off with club soda. Serve immediately.

name: Champagne Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen cranberry juice concentrate'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen pink lemonade concentrate'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6 ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen limeade concentrate'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'white wine, chilled'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'liter', 'name': 'carbonated water, chilled'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottles', 'name': 'champagne, chilled'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon - sliced, for garnish'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh mint, garnish'}
steps: In a large punch bowl, combine cranberry juice concentrate, pink lemonade concentrate, limeade concentrate, white wine, club soda, and champagne. Garnish with lemon slices and fresh mint leaves.

name: Vodka Lemonade with Mint
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh mint leaves, chopped'}, {'quantity': '⅔', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'vodka'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'crushed ice'}
steps: Combine mint and sugar in a large bowl. Stir in vodka and lemon juice. Cover and refrigerate lemonade, 30 minutes to 2 hours.. Strain lemonade into a pitcher. Fill six (6- to 8-ounce) glasses with crushed ice; pour lemonade over ice.

name: Sangria by the Pros
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'orange'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'all purpose apples, pared, cored and sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pitted cherries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh pineapple chunks'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'brandy'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'dry red wine'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 ounce) can', 'name': 'lemon-lime soda to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'orange juice to taste'}
steps: Slice orange, lemon, and lime into thin rounds. Place the sliced citrus in a pitcher with apples, cherries, and pineapple.. Pour in brandy and refrigerate for 2 hours or more. Chill the bottle of red wine, lemon-lime soda, and orange juice at the same time.. Gently crush the fruits with a spoon, then stir in red wine, lemon-lime soda, and orange juice. Add additional brandy or orange juice to taste.

name: Peach Cosmo
ingredients: {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'cranberry juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1.5 fluid ounce) jigger', 'name': 'citron vodka'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'peach schnapps'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}
steps: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add cranberry juice, vodka, schnapps, and lime juice. Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled martini glass to serve.

name: Christmas Rum Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '⅔', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(4 ounce) jar', 'name': 'maraschino cherries, with juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'fluid ounce', 'name': 'triple sec liqueur'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'light rum'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'orange, sliced into rounds'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, sliced into rounds'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) can', 'name': 'pineapple chunks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'liter', 'name': 'carbonated water'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice'}
steps: In a punch bowl, combine sugar, orange juice, and lemon juice; stir until sugar dissolves. Add cherries, triple sec, light rum, orange slices, lemon slices, and pineapple chunks. Refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours to allow flavors to blend.. Just before serving, pour in carbonated water and add ice.

name: Spiked Caramel Apple Cider
ingredients: {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'apple cider'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'caramel ice cream topping, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'turbinado sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'kosher salt'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'apple pie spice'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'spiced rum'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cinnamon sticks'}
steps: Stir together apple cider and 4 tablespoons caramel ice cream topping in a 4-quart slow cooker until smooth. Cover and cook on Low for 3 to 4 hours, or on High for 1 1/2 to 2 hours.. Mix together sugar, salt, and apple pie spice in a small shallow bowl. Pour remaining 2 tablespoons caramel topping into a small saucer.. Dip the rims of 8 mugs or heatproof glasses into caramel topping, evenly coating the rim; then dip into spice mixture. Ladle hot cider into mugs. Add 3 tablespoons spiced rum to each mug and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Candie's Simply Great Punch
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(46 fluid ounce) cans', 'name': 'fruit punch'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(2 liter) bottle', 'name': 'lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'gallon', 'name': 'French vanilla ice cream'}
steps: Pour chilled punch and soda into a punch bowl. Scoop out an entire half-gallon of ice cream and carefully slide into punch.

name: Old-Fashioned Pink Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '9', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cranberry juice, chilled'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice as needed'}
